description:
Incident #: 0808-1718

Description: this incident occurred in 1718, near N[REDACTED], Bahamas. A Fioncit Royal Navy ship set sail to retrieve the Book of Dreams (E-0808-a), an artifact said to be made by the gods and to be able to fulfill one's deepest desires. Months later, the ship returned empty, without its crew nor any remains of them.

Note: we have recently recovered the Captain's diary. We thought this would shed some light on the fate of the crew, but it only brought more questions. We would like your professional opinion on this matter.

Was all this an act of gods or an act of Man?

Thank you for your aid.

Regards,

B. C.

~~~~~~~~

Thank you for playing! Feel free to leave your thoughts in the comment section.

DISCLAIMER

This is a work of fiction. Any resemblance to actual persons or events is a coincidence. The creator does not necessarily endorse all opinions and actions in this. This is a purely textual game but may contain subject matter that can be disturbing to some.

HINT

This game contains 6 endings.

For best experience, please play in your browser.
